name: Merging Fluids
description:
A submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by IronGames.

You are the little witch taking the merging fluids exam. To do this, you need to determine the ingredients that you were given and create the required liquid with it. The exam will have five tasks. Each mistake lowers your grade by 1 until the exam fails.

Your equipment:

Use the Dispenser to get the fluid. You can select the type of fluid with the arrows and pour it into the flask with the middle button. For each task, several unknown types of fluid are given. They can be identified by color, density, and reactions.

Pump is used to mix the contents of two flasks into a third. Install the flasks and click on Pump to start the process. If such a reaction is not possible, then the contents of the flasks will be wasted.

Use Scales to find out the mass of the liquid.

Use Sender to submit your work by pressing the big red button.
